flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Using some scrap wood, some Craigslist finds and an old coffin, this guide shows how to build a go kart that's very unique.
guide.introduction_rendered: Using some scrap wood, some Craigslist finds and an old coffin, this guide shows how to build a go kart that's very unique.

lines.text: Use 2x4 lumber to build a frame to hold the motor, batteries, coffin, wheels and lights.
lines.text_raw: Use 2x4 lumber to build a frame to hold the motor, batteries, coffin, wheels and lights.

lines.text: Use 2x4 lumber to build a frame to hold the motor, batteries, coffin, wheels and lights.

guide.summary: Build an electric, Halloween-themed go kart.
guide.title: Haunt Rod
